item.title: Multiple ways to import text data in R
item.description: Chapter 2. Vector Data Handling with sf sf do not need to create simple feature geometry from scratch. An important feature of an sf object is that it is basically a data.frame with geometric information stored as a variable (column). This means that transforming an sf object works just like transforming a data.frame. Basically, everything you can do to a data.frame, you can do to an sf as well.
